about_the_game:
Jazzhands is a gesture controlled, action-based rhythm game. Restore harmony to a silenced galaxy as you refine your choreography through increasingly challenging levels. Destroy beats by channelling the power of your bare hands through only the eye of your webcam.

Play the role of an intergalactic performer travelling planet to planet performing songs from a variety of genres, from techno to rock and metal. Meet new characters, and unlock new beats, as you progress through your quest to create a symphony to unite all. When you're done, explore the myriad of custom levels!

  • Over 20 carefully curated story levels spread across 6 distinct worlds.
  • Boogie to your own beat by exploring custom levels created by the community.



Jazzhands uses computer vision to interpret your gestures requiring only a webcam, avoiding the requirement of specialist VR hardware. This facilitates a unique mixed-reality experience that aims to remain accessible to most gamers. Jazzhands has been further optimized to work with a broad spectrum of devices, including those with less processing capabilities.

  • All you need to get started is a basic webcam or an integrated camera.
  • There's no need for specialised VR or MR technology, or a high-end gaming device.
  • Offline, local and private - we don't store any footage, everything is live-time.





In a galaxy once thriving with song, the mysterious Silent Composer has repressed all rhythm. Travel through 6 muted worlds meeting inhabitants and restoring missing melodies in a mission to extinguish the Composer's dark presence, and release his rhythmic grip.

  • Distinctive worlds, each hosting a range of unique characters and lore.
  • Uncover the galaxy's secrets as you embark on a mission to save it.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or M1/M2/M3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Additional Notes: Requires a webcam/integrated camera.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Catalina
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or M1/M2/M3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Additional Notes: Requires a webcam/integrated camera.
